title: Drawing, "Sketches from South America.  a. Native hut, Guayaquil, Ecuador.  b. a tree.  Like -195", May 1857
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at ?:  Guayaquil / May 57

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, between a tree and a bush:  A tree which appears ["is" - struck out] / almost / precisely the same as our willow
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a hut standing on posts in a plain, with a woman shown hanging laundry in a roofless wing, beneath which another is another figure and a third one is seated in the hut.

Verso:  a tree

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from South America.  a. Native hut, Guayaquil, Ecuador.  b. a tree.  Like -195", May 1857.
May 1857. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-196.
